root.name: B-Daman Baku Gaiden: Victory e no Michi
root.description: OverviewB-Daman Baku Gaiden: Victory e no Michi is a Role-Playing game developed by C.P. Brain and published by Media Factory for the Game Boy Color platform. B-Daman Baku Gaiden: Victory e no Michi was never released outside of Japan.
